sections.title: Describe the Situation
sections.prompt: Write about a recent situation that triggered strong emotions.
sections.placeholder: What happened? Describe the situation objectively...

subsections.title: Facts (What actually happened)
subsections.prompt: List only the observable facts - what could be recorded on video...

subsections.title: Assumptions (Your interpretation)
subsections.prompt: What did you assume about their intentions, feelings, or motivations...

sections.title: Alternative Explanations
sections.prompt: What are other possible explanations for what happened?
sections.placeholder: List at-least 2-3 alternative explanations that could also be true.

sections.title: Emotion & Facts Check
sections.prompt: Reflect on whether your emotions matched the facts or your assumptions.
sections.placeholder: Do your emotions fit the facts or your assumptions? what would change if you focused on facts instead?

greatWork.title: Great Work!
greatWork.content: You've practiced separating facts from assumptions - a key skill for emotional regulation.
